VRDisplayCapabilitiesHasPosition.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The hasPosition read-only property of the interface returns true if the VR display can track and return position information.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
